item.title: 3 Managers Arrested Over Deaths at U.K. Hospital Where Lucy Letby Worked
item.description: People who were managers when Ms. Letby was convicted of killing babies were arrested on suspicion of manslaughter by gross negligence.

item.title: The U.S. Sends Lots of Plastic Trash Overseas. Malaysia Just Said No Thanks.
item.description: No country receives more discarded plastic from wealthy countries, but shipments from the United States are no longer welcome.

item.title: Britain’s Royal Train, Once a Symbol of Luxury and Modernity, Is Being Retired
item.description: Specially commissioned private rail cars have transported the royal family around the country for over 150 years, beginning with an initially trepidat...

item.title: Top Russian General Convicted in High-Profile Corruption Case
item.description: Timur Ivanov, a longtime deputy defense minister, was sentenced to 13 years in a penal colony, according to the Russian state news agency Tass.

item.title: Israel’s Netanyahu Says He Will Meet With Trump Next Week
item.description: The Israeli prime minister’s expected visit to the United States comes as the cease-fire with Iran may create new momentum for a truce in Gaza.
